name: GLOWING COLLAR PENDANT
description1: Does your dog run off during his night potty trip? Or maybe your nighttime walk takes you past roads without street lights.
description2: If you are having pooch visibility problems, then this Glowing Collar Pendant is exactly what you need. This light-up pendant allows you to keep track of your dog in the dark, fog and snow. This small LED light clips onto your dog’s collar, providing instant light. Once you are done, unclip it, and throw it in your junk drawer until next time!

name: BUNGEE SEAT-BELT LEASH
description1: PROTECT YOUR PRECIOUS PUP FROM INJURIES!
description2: Our furry friends love to move around in the car a lot but this can often result in risk of accident & injury to your precious pup. Why not keep him in place with our dog seat belt leash? This is a secure telescopic bungee dog seat belt leash so that you can have a safe ride with your pup & peace of mind. It's really comfortable & protects your pup from falling or hurting itself while moving in the car too much. Our dog seat belt leash feature unique, durable fabric, quality hardware, and a strong nylon core. They're machine washable and made to last:

name: MULTIFUNCTIONAL DOG LEASH 2.0
description1: THIS PRODUCT IS A LIFE-SAVER, IF YOU TAKE YOUR DOG TO WALKS, HIKES, OR RUNS!
description2: The All-New Multifunctional Leash is a must-have for all dog owners! It includes everything that you could ever need!

name: PET ADJUSTABLE WALKING LEASH
description2: All cat lovers know that cats are very sensitive. Before a cat get used to its harness, it will keep backing off to get rid of the harness. To solve this problem completely, our designer develop this adjustable collar harness. You can tie or loose the collar to fit your cat's neck circumference so that your lovely cat will never escape the harness again.

name: ADJUSTABLE CAR SEAT HARNESS
description2: Made of high quality nylon fabric, with metal swivel snap and buckle. Keeps your pet safely restrained and secured in vehicle while driving. ADJUSTABLE: The length of seat belt can be adjusted from 16 to 27 inch, which allows your dog to sit, stand or lie down comfortably in your car.

name: METAL NECK CHAIN
description2: Pattern: Solid, Feature:Personalized , Color: Gold, Silver , Collar Type: Basic Collars , Item Size:37cm*2cm
